DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : A study evaluate successful Los Angeles-based , peer-led African American breast cancer survivor support group may help develop guide organize maintain breast cancer support group . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study support group African-American breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Study Support Groups African-American Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Characterize five establish Los Angeles ( LA ) -based , peer-led African American Breast Cancer Survivor ( AABCS ) support group identify evaluate successful element structure process distinguish group : purpose goal ; theory techniques utilized ; structure group implementation specific goal ; cultural aspect incorporate enhance efficacy ; similarity difference among AABCS support group . - Develop preliminary `` Culturally Informed Breast Cancer Support Group Guide '' organize maintain support group , model `` best model '' experience five establish LA-based support group AABCS . - Conduct three needs-assessment focus group 5 key informant interview Inland Empire evaluate psychosocial need resource AABCS region . OUTLINE : At least 10 support group leader ( 2 support group ) undergo semi-structured interview elicit information need breast cancer survivor community cultural mode support give . Eight twelve African American Breast Cancer Survivors ( AABCS ) participate 5 focus group discussion complete questionnaire breast cancer experience support group qualitative quantitative analysis . At least 5 Inland Empire community leader undergo semi-structured interview elicit information need breast cancer survivor community . Eight twelve AABCS Inland Empire participate 3 focus group discussion complete questionnaire breast cancer experience support group qualitative quantitative analysis .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : African American Breast Cancer Survivor ( AABCS ) meet 1 follow criterion : A member 1 5 support group list Live Inland Empire region California A cancer support group leader facilitator 1 5 establish support group Los Angeles : Women Essence ( WOE ) Women Color ( WOC ) Support Sisters African American Breast Cancer Support Groups Sisters Celebrate Life A community leader knowledgeable breast cancer support service Inland Empire region PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
